entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending late this evening then cloudy. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023
